name: College Munchies (Edible Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookie Dough)
author: Adrian Lee
summary: In college, my roommate taught me how to make easy, cheap, edible cookie dough for those late-night cravings. They're delicious and can be baked to make chocolate peanut butter cookies!
ingredients: ⅓ cup instant milk chocolate drink mix
3 cups all-purpose flour, or as needed
directions: Combine sugar, peanut butter, and margarine in a large bowl; beat until creamy
Mix in chocolate drink mix and milk until blended
Mix in flour until dough comes together and is no longer sticky
Roll dough into balls; transfer to a large plate lined with waxed paper
